name: view
description:
NAME
VIEW - analyze vertex degrees and component connections

SYNOPSIS
VIEW [-h]
VIEW -d|-c|-a graphname

DESCRIPTION
VIEW analyzes graph properties including vertex degrees and connected components.
Example of vertex degrees:
A: 1
B: 2
C: 3
Example of connected components:
Current graph contains 2 connected components

COMMAND-LINE OPTIONS
-h, --help - display this help text.
-d, --vertex_degree - calculate degrees for all vertices.
-c, --connected-components - identify connected components.
-a, --all - perform both degree and component analysis.
